pdhp65:2: toṣṭī sukhā yā itarī<supplied>tarena</supplied> sabbassa pāpassa sukhaṁ prahāṇaṁ ।।
pdhp66:1: sukhā mātreatā loke tato petteatā sukhā ।
pdhp66:2: śāmannatā sukhā loke tato brāhmannatā sukhā ।।
pdhp67:1: sukhaṁ yāvaj jarā śīlaṁ sukhā śraddhā pratiṣṭhitā ।
pdhp67:2: sukhā attharasā vācā assiṁ mānakkhayo sukho ।।
pdhp68:1: sukho buddhāna uppādo sukhā dhammassa deśanā ।
pdhp68:2: sukhā saṁghassa sāmaggrī samaggrāṇāṁ tapo sukho ।।
pdhp69:1: sukhaṁ daṁśanam ayirāṇāṁ saṁvāso pi satāṁ sukho ।
pdhp69:2: addaṁśanena bālānāṁ niccam eva sukhī siyā ।।
pdhp70:3: dhīrā tu sukhasaṁvāsā ñātīnaṁ vā samāgamo ।।
pdhp71:1: tassā hi dhīraṁ ca bahuśśutañ ca dhoreyaśīlavratamantam ayiraṁ ।
pdhp71:2: taṁ tārisaṁ sappuruṣaṁ sumedhaṁ sevetha nakkhattapathe va candramā ।।
pdhp72:1: priyāto jāyate dukkhaṁ priyā śokā priyā bhayaṁ ।
pdhp72:2: priyāto vipramuttassa nāsti śokā kato bhayaṁ ।।
pdhp73:2: priyassa addaṁśanaṁ dukkhaṁ apriyassa ca daṁśanaṁ ।।
pdhp74:1: tassā priyaṁ na kayirātha priyāvādo hi pāpako ।
pdhp74:2: ggraṁthā tesaṁ na vijjanti yesaṁ nāsti priyāpriyaṁ ।।
pdhp77:2: caje māttāsukhaṁ dhīro saṁpaśśaṁ vipulāṁ sukham ।।
pdhp78:1: manujassa sadā satīmato māttaṁ jāniya laddhibhojane ।
pdhp78:2: tanukā ’ssa bhavanti vedanā śanikaṁ jīrati āyu pālayaṁ ।।
pdhp79:1: dullabho puruṣājaṁño na so sabbattha jāyati ।
pdhp79:2: yattha so jāyate vīro taṁ kulaṁ sukham edhati ।।
pdhp80:1: sabbattha ve sappuruṣā bhavanti na kāmakāmā lapayanti santo ।
pdhp80:2: sukhena phuṭṭhā uttavā dukhena noccāvacaṁ sappuruṣā karonti ।।
pdhp81:1: jayaṁ veraṁ prasavati dukkhaṁ śeti parājito ।
pdhp82:1: sukhā najjo sūpatitthā sukho dhammajito jano ।
pdhp83:1: sukhaṁ draṣṭuṁ śīlavanto sukhaṁ draṣṭuṁ bahuśśutā ।
pdhp83:2: arahanto pi sukhaṁ draṣṭuṁ vipramuttā niropadhī ।।
